info.description:
MWordGen
        ~~~~~~~~
        
        MWordGen is a Markov statistics based word generator.
        
        It tokenizes text to words. Then it analyzes the probabiliy
        of letter combinations. This statistical information is then
        used to generate new words.
        
        :copyright: 2006 by Florian Boesch.
        :license: GNU LGPL, see LICENSE for more details.
info.name: mwordgen
info.summary: MWordGen is a Markov statistics based word generator.
